During extra time </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="457.284" y1="467.284" x0="79.373" x1="361.907" width="282.534" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 457.284, 361.907, 467.284]" word_margin="0.1">the same rules apply to starting and stopping time as during regular </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="445.284" y1="455.284" x0="79.373" x1="341.007" width="261.634" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 445.284, 341.007, 455.284]" word_margin="0.1">game time. Extra time is not divided into periods. Penalty time </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="433.284" y1="443.284" x0="79.373" x1="359.457" width="280.084" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 433.284, 359.457, 443.284]" word_margin="0.1">remaining after regular game time shall continue during extra time. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>

    <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="527.596" y1="540.596" x0="56.693" x1="304.979" width="248.286" height="13.0" bbox="[56.693, 527.596, 304.979, 540.596]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="527.596" y1="540.596" x0="56.693" x1="304.979" width="248.286" height="13.0" bbox="[56.693, 527.596, 304.979, 540.596]" index="1">303 Particular regulations for goalkeepers </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="505.303" y1="515.303" x0="56.693" x1="311.962" width="255.269" height="10.0" bbox="[56.693, 505.303, 311.962, 515.303]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="505.303" y1="515.303" x0="56.693" x1="311.962" width="255.269" height="10.0" bbox="[56.693, 505.303, 311.962, 515.303]" index="2">1) All goalkeepers shall be marked in the match record. </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="421.433" y1="503.433" x0="79.373" x1="363.763" width="284.39" height="82.0" bbox="[79.373, 421.433, 363.763, 503.433]" index="3"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="493.433" y1="503.433" x0="79.373" x1="360.617" width="281.244" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 493.433, 360.617, 503.433]" word_margin="0.1">The marking shall be made with a &#8220;G&#8221; in the margin. A player marked as </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="481.433" y1="491.433" x0="79.373" x1="359.417" width="280.044" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 481.433, 359.417, 491.433]" word_margin="0.1">goalkeeper is not allowed to participate as a field player, with a stick, </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="469.433" y1="479.433" x0="79.373" x1="357.797" width="278.424" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 469.433, 357.797, 479.433]" word_margin="0.1">during the same match. If a team due to injury or penalty has to re- </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="457.433" y1="467.433" x0="79.373" x1="350.458" width="271.085" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 457.433, 350.458, 467.433]" word_margin="0.1">place the goalkeeper with a field player, they have a maximum of </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="445.433" y1="455.433" x0="79.373" x1="348.113" width="268.74" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 445.433, 348.113, 455.433]" word_margin="0.1">3 minutes to properly equip the substitute, but none of this time </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="433.433" y1="443.433" x0="79.373" x1="363.763" width="284.39" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 433.433, 363.763, 443.433]" word_margin="0.1">shall be used for warming up. The new goalkeeper shall be marked </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="421.433" y1="431.433" x0="79.373" x1="335.123" width="255.75" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 421.433, 335.123, 431.433]" word_margin="0.1">in the match record, and the time of the change shall be noted. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="385.303" y1="395.303" x0="56.693" x1="68.193" width="11.5" height="10.0" bbox="[56.693, 385.303, 68.193, 395.303]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="385.303" y1="395.303" x0="56.693" x1="68.193" width="11.5" height="10.0" bbox="[56.693, 385.303, 68.193, 395.303]" index="4">2) </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="313.433" y1="395.303" x0="79.373" x1="364.163" width="284.79" height="81.87" bbox="[79.373, 313.433, 364.163, 395.303]" index="5"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="385.303" y1="395.303" x0="79.373" x1="364.163" width="284.79" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 385.303, 364.163, 395.303]" word_margin="0.1">If a goalkeeper entirely leaves the goal crease during play, they </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="373.303" y1="383.303" x0="79.373" x1="360.875" width="281.502" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 373.303, 360.875, 383.303]" word_margin="0.1">shall, until returning, be considered a field player, yet without a stick. </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="361.433" y1="371.433" x0="79.373" x1="352.317" width="272.944" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 361.433, 352.317, 371.433]" word_margin="0.1">This does not apply in connection with a throw-out. A goalkeeper </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="349.433" y1="359.433" x0="79.373" x1="357.767" width="278.394" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 349.433, 357.767, 359.433]" word_margin="0.1">is considered to have entirely left the goal crease when no part of </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="337.433" y1="347.433" x0="79.373" x1="362.677" width="283.304" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 337.433, 362.677, 347.433]" word_margin="0.1">their body touches the floor inside the goal crease. The goalkeeper </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="325.433" y1="335.433" x0="79.373" x1="359.037" width="279.664" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 325.433, 359.037, 335.433]" word_margin="0.1">is, however, allowed to jump within their own goal crease. The lines </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="313.433" y1="323.433" x0="79.373" x1="188.233" width="108.86" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 313.433, 188.233, 323.433]" word_margin="0.1">belong to the goal crease. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>

    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="193.176" y1="251.176" x0="80.152" x1="364.611" width="284.458" height="58.0" bbox="[80.152, 193.176, 364.611, 251.176]" index="9"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="241.176" y1="251.176" x0="80.152" x1="349.472" width="269.32" height="10.0" bbox="[80.152, 241.176, 349.472, 251.176]" word_margin="0.1">If an incorrectly numbered player participates in the match, the </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="229.176" y1="239.176" x0="80.152" x1="362.112" width="281.96" height="10.0" bbox="[80.152, 229.176, 362.112, 239.176]" word_margin="0.1">match record shall be corrected, and the offence shall be reported </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="217.176" y1="227.176" x0="80.152" x1="364.611" width="284.458" height="10.0" bbox="[80.152, 217.176, 364.611, 227.176]" word_margin="0.1">to the administrating authority. A player is allowed to </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="408.628" y1="418.628" x0="79.373" x1="345.128" width="265.755" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 408.628, 345.128, 418.628]" word_margin="0.1">jump over the ball as well as play, touch and stop the ball below </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="396.628" y1="406.628" x0="79.373" x1="348.537" width="269.164" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 396.628, 348.537, 406.628]" word_margin="0.1">knee level.     <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="528.286" y1="538.416" x0="56.693" x1="346.7" width="290.007" height="10.13" bbox="[56.693, 528.286, 346.7, 538.416]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="528.286" y1="538.416" x0="56.693" x1="346.7" width="290.007" height="10.13" bbox="[56.693, 528.286, 346.7, 538.416]" index="0"> 18) When a penalty is imposed during play (prescribed offence </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="468.416" y1="526.286" x0="79.373" x1="358.707" width="279.334" height="57.87" bbox="[79.373, 468.416, 358.707, 526.286]" index="1"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="516.286" y1="526.286" x0="79.373" x1="101.893" width="22.52" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 516.286, 101.893, 526.286]" word_margin="0.1">sign) </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="504.416" y1="514.416" x0="79.373" x1="349.647" width="270.274" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 504.416, 349.647, 514.416]" word_margin="0.1">The free-hit shall be taken where the offence was committed.     <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="456.463" y1="466.463" x0="56.787" x1="314.031" width="257.244" height="10.0" bbox="[56.787, 456.463, 314.031, 466.463]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="456.463" y1="466.463" x0="56.787" x1="314.031" width="257.244" height="10.0" bbox="[56.787, 456.463, 314.031, 466.463]" index="2">1) When an offence leading to a penalty is committed, </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="384.593" y1="454.463" x0="79.467" x1="365.287" width="285.82" height="69.87" bbox="[79.467, 384.593, 365.287, 454.463]" index="3"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="444.463" y1="454.463" x0="79.467" x1="220.746" width="141.279" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 444.463, 220.746, 454.463]" word_margin="0.1">the offender shall be penalised. </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="432.593" y1="442.593" x0="79.467" x1="365.227" width="285.76" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 432.593, 365.227, 442.593]" word_margin="0.1">If the referees are unable to point out the offender, or if the offence </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="420.593" y1="430.593" x0="79.467" x1="365.287" width="285.82" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 420.593, 365.287, 430.593]" word_margin="0.1">is committed by a member of the team staff, the team captain shall </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="408.593" y1="418.593" x0="79.467" x1="346.793" width="267.326" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 408.593, 346.793, 418.593]" word_margin="0.1">choose a field player, who is not already penalised, to serve the </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="396.593" y1="406.593" x0="79.467" x1="357.717" width="278.25" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 396.593, 357.717, 406.593]" word_margin="0.1">penalty. If the team captain refuses to do this, or is penalised, the </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="384.593" y1="394.593" x0="79.467" x1="215.657" width="136.19" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 384.593, 215.657, 394.593]" word_margin="0.1">referees shall choose the player. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="324.593" y1="370.593" x0="79.467" x1="361.716" width="282.249" height="46.0" bbox="[79.467, 324.593, 361.716, 370.593]" index="4"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="360.593" y1="370.593" x0="79.467" x1="359.731" width="280.264" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 360.593, 359.731, 370.593]" word_margin="0.1">All penalties carried out shall be noted in the match record with the </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="348.593" y1="358.593" x0="79.467" x1="358.822" width="279.354" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 348.593, 358.822, 358.593]" word_margin="0.1">time, number of the player, type of penalty and cause of penalty. If </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="336.593" y1="346.593" x0="79.467" x1="357.781" width="278.314" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 336.593, 357.781, 346.593]" word_margin="0.1">the penalty is caused by an offence committed during an interrup- </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="324.593" y1="334.593" x0="79.467" x1="361.716" width="282.249" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 324.593, 361.716, 334.593]" word_margin="0.1">tion, play shall be resumed according to what caused the interruption. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="288.593" y1="310.593" x0="79.467" x1="357.212" width="277.744" height="22.0" bbox="[79.467, 288.593, 357.212, 310.593]" index="5"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="300.593" y1="310.593" x0="79.467" x1="357.212" width="277.744" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 300.593, 357.212, 310.593]" word_margin="0.1">A penalised team captain loses the right to speak to the referees </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="288.593" y1="298.593" x0="79.467" x1="194.227" width="114.76" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 288.593, 194.227, 298.593]" word_margin="0.1">unless addressed by them. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="293.281" y1="303.281" x0="385.181" x1="397.181" width="12.0" height="10.0" bbox="[385.181, 293.281, 397.181, 303.281]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="293.281" y1="303.281" x0="385.181" x1="397.181" width="12.0" height="10.0" bbox="[385.181, 293.281, 397.181, 303.281]" index="6">49 </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextLineHorizontal y0="264.463" y1="274.463" x0="56.787" x1="346.793" width="290.006" height="10.0" bbox="[56.787, 264.463, 346.793, 274.463]" word_margin="0.1"><LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="264.463" y1="274.463" x0="56.787" x1="346.793" width="290.006" height="10.0" bbox="[56.787, 264.463, 346.793, 274.463]" index="7">2) A penalised player shall be on the penalty bench during the </LTTextBoxHorizontal></LTTextLineHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="228.593" y1="262.463" x0="79.467" x1="336.032" width="256.564" height="33.87" bbox="[79.467, 228.593, 336.032, 262.463]" index="8"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="252.463" y1="262.463" x0="79.467" x1="144.576" width="65.109" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 252.463, 144.576, 262.463]" word_margin="0.1">entire penalty. </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="240.593" y1="250.593" x0="79.467" x1="336.032" width="256.564" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 240.593, 336.032, 250.593]" word_margin="0.1">A player penalised during penalty shots after extra time shall </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="228.593" y1="238.593" x0="79.467" x1="232.713" width="153.245" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 228.593, 232.713, 238.593]" word_margin="0.1">not be placed on the penalty bench. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="180.593" y1="214.593" x0="79.467" x1="354.197" width="274.73" height="34.0" bbox="[79.467, 180.593, 354.197, 214.593]" index="9"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="204.593" y1="214.593" x0="79.467" x1="352.407" width="272.94" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 204.593, 352.407, 214.593]" word_margin="0.1">A penalty, which has not expired at the end of regular game time, </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="192.593" y1="202.593" x0="79.467" x1="354.197" width="274.73" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 192.593, 354.197, 202.593]" word_margin="0.1">shall continue during extra time. After the extra time all penalties </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="180.593" y1="190.593" x0="79.467" x1="322.302" width="242.835" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 180.593, 322.302, 190.593]" word_margin="0.1">except match penalties are considered to be terminated. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="120.593" y1="166.593" x0="79.467" x1="363.157" width="283.69" height="46.0" bbox="[79.467, 120.593, 363.157, 166.593]" index="10"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="156.593" y1="166.593" x0="79.467" x1="353.067" width="273.6" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 156.593, 353.067, 166.593]" word_margin="0.1">A penalised player shall be on the same side of the centre line as </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="144.593" y1="154.593" x0="79.467" x1="363.157" width="283.69" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 144.593, 363.157, 154.593]" word_margin="0.1">their own team, with the exception of when the secretariat and the </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="132.593" y1="142.593" x0="79.467" x1="353.557" width="274.09" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 132.593, 353.557, 142.593]" word_margin="0.1">penalty benches are situated on the same side of the rink as the </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="120.593" y1="130.593" x0="79.467" x1="163.984" width="84.516" height="10.0" bbox="[79.467, 120.593, 163.984, 130.593]" word_margin="0.1">substitution zones. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>

A penalised player is not allowed to participate in a </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="493.172" y1="503.172" x0="79.373" x1="352.693" width="273.32" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 493.172, 352.693, 503.172]" word_margin="0.1">time out. A player, whose penalty expires, shall immediately leave </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="481.172" y1="491.172" x0="79.373" x1="362.593" width="283.22" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 481.172, 362.593, 491.172]" word_margin="0.1">the penalty bench, unless the number of penalties for the own team </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="469.172" y1="479.172" x0="79.373" x1="361.383" width="282.01" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 469.172, 361.383, 479.172]" word_margin="0.1">makes this impossible or the penalty expiring is a personal penalty. </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="457.172" y1="467.172" x0="79.373" x1="349.533" width="270.16" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 457.172, 349.533, 467.172]" word_margin="0.1">A goalkeeper, whose penalty expires, shall not leave the penalty </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="445.172" y1="455.172" x0="79.373" x1="220.008" width="140.636" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 445.172, 220.008, 455.172]" word_margin="0.1">bench until the next interruption. </LTTextLineHorizontal></LTTextBoxHorizontal>
    <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="361.172" y1="431.172" x0="79.373" x1="351.077" width="271.705" height="70.0" bbox="[79.373, 361.172, 351.077, 431.172]" index="2"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="421.172" y1="431.172" x0="79.373" x1="349.887" width="270.514" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 421.172, 349.887, 431.172]" word_margin="0.1">A penalised player who is injured may be replaced on the penalty </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="409.172" y1="419.172" x0="79.373" x1="351.077" width="271.705" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 409.172, 351.077, 419.172]" word_margin="0.1">bench by a field player who is not already penalised.     <LTTextBoxHorizontal y0="109.172" y1="263.042" x0="79.373" x1="364.723" width="285.35" height="153.87" bbox="[79.373, 109.172, 364.723, 263.042]" index="4"><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="253.042" y1="263.042" x0="79.373" x1="347.697" width="268.324" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 253.042, 347.697, 263.042]" word_margin="0.1">If a goalkeeper incurs one or several minor bench penalties, </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="241.042" y1="251.042" x0="79.373" x1="327.087" width="247.714" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 241.042, 327.087, 251.042]" word_margin="0.1">the team captain shall choose a field player, who is not </LTTextLineHorizontal><LTTextLineHorizontal y0="229.042" y1="239.042" x0="79.373" x1="331.237" width="251.864" height="10.0" bbox="[79.373, 229.042, 331.237, 239.042]" word_margin="0.1">already penalised, to serve the penalty.
